Nature-based solutions (NbS) are gaining recognition as fundamental tools for building communities more resilient to climate challenges. Specialized institutions are developing guidelines and tools that facilitate the integration of NbS into community planning. Although these approaches require significant initial investment, studies demonstrate that long-term benefits far exceed costs, both economically and socially.
